verses.text: Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* to his \w anointed|strong="H4899"\w*, to \w Cyrus|strong="H3566"\w*, whose right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* I have \w holden|strong="H2388"\w*, to \w subdue|strong="H7286"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* him; and I will \w loose|strong="H6605"\w* the \w loins|strong="H4975"\w* of \w kings|strong="H4428"\w*, to \w open|strong="H6605"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* him the two leaved \w gates|strong="H1817"\w*; and the \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* shall not be \w shut|strong="H5462"\w*;\f + \fr 45.1 \ft have…: or, strengthened\f*

I will \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee, and \w make|strong="H3474"\w* the crooked \w places|strong="H1921"\w* \w straight|strong="H3474"\w*: I will break in \w pieces|strong="H7665"\w* the \w gates|strong="H1817"\w* of \w brass|strong="H5154"\w*, and cut in \w sunder|strong="H1438"\w* the \w bars|strong="H1280"\w* of \w iron|strong="H1270"\w*:

And I will \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee the \w treasures|strong="H0214"\w* of \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w*, and hidden \w riches|strong="H4301"\w* of secret \w places|strong="H4565"\w*, that thou mayest \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I, the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, which \w call|strong="H7121"\w* \add thee\add* by thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, \add am\add* the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

For \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* my \w servant’s|strong="H5650"\w* sake, and \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* mine \w elect|strong="H0972"\w*, I have even \w called|strong="H7121"\w* thee by thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w*: I have \w surnamed|strong="H3655"\w* thee, though thou hast not \w known|strong="H3045"\w* me.

¶ I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \add there is\add* none else, \add there is\add* no \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w beside|strong="H2108"\w* me: I \w girded|strong="H0247"\w* thee, though thou hast not \w known|strong="H3045"\w* me:

That they may \w know|strong="H3045"\w* from the \w rising|strong="H4217"\w* of the \w sun|strong="H8121"\w*, and from the \w west|strong="H4628"\w*, that \add there is\add* \w none|strong="H0657"\w* \w beside|strong="H1107"\w* me. I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \add there is\add* none else.

I \w form|strong="H3335"\w* the \w light|strong="H0216"\w*, and \w create|strong="H1254"\w* \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w*: I \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*, and \w create|strong="H1254"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*: I the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* all these \add things\add*.

Drop \w down|strong="H7491"\w*, ye \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*, from \w above|strong="H4605"\w*, and let the \w skies|strong="H7834"\w* pour \w down|strong="H5140"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w*: let the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w open|strong="H6605"\w*, and let them bring \w forth|strong="H6509"\w* \w salvation|strong="H3468"\w*, and let \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* spring \w up|strong="H6779"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*; I the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* have \w created|strong="H1254"\w* it.

\w Woe|strong="H1945"\w* unto him that \w striveth|strong="H7378"\w* with his \w Maker|strong="H3335"\w*! \add Let\add* the \w potsherd|strong="H2789"\w* \add strive\add* with the \w potsherds|strong="H2789"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0127"\w*. Shall the \w clay|strong="H2563"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w* to him that \w fashioneth|strong="H3335"\w* it, What \w makest|strong="H6213"\w* thou? or thy \w work|strong="H6467"\w*, He hath no \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*?

\w Woe|strong="H1945"\w* unto him that \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* unto \add his\add* \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, What \w begettest|strong="H3205"\w* thou? or to the \w woman|strong="H0802"\w*, What hast thou brought \w forth|strong="H2342"\w*?

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, the Holy \w One|strong="H6918"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and his \w Maker|strong="H3335"\w*, \w Ask|strong="H7592"\w* me of things to \w come|strong="H0857"\w* concerning my \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and concerning the \w work|strong="H6467"\w* of my \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w command|strong="H6680"\w* ye me.

I have \w made|strong="H6213"\w* the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, and \w created|strong="H1254"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w* upon it: I, \add even\add* my \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*, have stretched \w out|strong="H5186"\w* the \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*, and all their \w host|strong="H6635"\w* have I \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*.

I have raised him \w up|strong="H5782"\w* in \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w*, and I will \w direct|strong="H3474"\w* all his \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*: he shall \w build|strong="H1129"\w* my \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and he shall let \w go|strong="H7971"\w* my \w captives|strong="H1546"\w*, not for \w price|strong="H4242"\w* nor \w reward|strong="H7810"\w*, \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*.\f + \fr 45.13 \ft direct: or, make straight\f*

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, The \w labour|strong="H3018"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and \w merchandise|strong="H5505"\w* of \w Ethiopia|strong="H3568"\w* and of the \w Sabeans|strong="H5436"\w*, \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w stature|strong="H4060"\w*, shall come \w over|strong="H5674"\w* unto thee, and they shall be thine: they shall \w come|strong="H3212"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* thee; in \w chains|strong="H2131"\w* they shall come \w over|strong="H5674"\w*, and they shall fall \w down|strong="H7812"\w* unto thee, they shall make \w supplication|strong="H6419"\w* unto thee, \add saying\add*, Surely \w God|strong="H0410"\w* \add is\add* in thee; and \add there is\add* none else, \add there is\add* \w no|strong="H0657"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

\w Verily|strong="H0403"\w* thou \add art\add* a \w God|strong="H0410"\w* that \w hidest|strong="H5641"\w* thyself, O \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, the \w Saviour|strong="H3467"\w*.

They shall be \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w*, and also \w confounded|strong="H3637"\w*, all of them: they shall \w go|strong="H1980"\w* to \w confusion|strong="H3639"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w* \add that are\add* \w makers|strong="H2796"\w* of \w idols|strong="H6736"\w*.

\add But\add* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* shall be \w saved|strong="H3467"\w* in the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* with an \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w* \w salvation|strong="H8668"\w*: ye shall not be \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w* nor \w confounded|strong="H3637"\w* \w world|strong="H5769"\w* without \w end|strong="H5703"\w*.

For thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* that \w created|strong="H1254"\w* the \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*; \w God|strong="H0430"\w* himself that \w formed|strong="H3335"\w* the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* and \w made|strong="H6213"\w* it; he hath \w established|strong="H3559"\w* it, he \w created|strong="H1254"\w* it not in \w vain|strong="H8414"\w*, he \w formed|strong="H3335"\w* it to be \w inhabited|strong="H3427"\w*: I \add am\add* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; and \add there is\add* none else.

I have not \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* in \w secret|strong="H5643"\w*, in a \w dark|strong="H2822"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*: I \w said|strong="H0559"\w* not unto the \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* of \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, \w Seek|strong="H1245"\w* ye me in \w vain|strong="H8414"\w*: I the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w*, I \w declare|strong="H5046"\w* things that are \w right|strong="H4339"\w*.

¶ \w Assemble|strong="H6908"\w* yourselves and \w come|strong="H0935"\w*; draw \w near|strong="H5066"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*, ye \add that are\add* \w escaped|strong="H6412"\w* of the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*: they have no \w knowledge|strong="H3045"\w* that set \w up|strong="H5375"\w* the \w wood|strong="H6086"\w* of their graven \w image|strong="H6459"\w*, and \w pray|strong="H6419"\w* unto a \w god|strong="H0410"\w* \add that\add* cannot \w save|strong="H3467"\w*.

\w Tell|strong="H5046"\w* ye, and bring \add them\add* \w near|strong="H5066"\w*; yea, let them take \w counsel|strong="H3289"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*: who hath \w declared|strong="H8085"\w* this from ancient \w time|strong="H6924"\w*? \add who\add* hath \w told|strong="H5046"\w* it from that time? \add have\add* not I the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*? and \add there is\add* no \w God|strong="H0430"\w* else \w beside|strong="H1107"\w* me; a \w just|strong="H6662"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w* and a \w Saviour|strong="H3467"\w*; \add there is\add* \w none|strong="H0369"\w* \w beside|strong="H2108"\w* me.

\w Look|strong="H6437"\w* unto me, and be ye \w saved|strong="H3467"\w*, all the \w ends|strong="H0657"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*: for I \add am\add* \w God|strong="H0410"\w*, and \add there is\add* none else.

I have \w sworn|strong="H7650"\w* by myself, the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* is gone \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of my \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \add in\add* \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w*, and shall not \w return|strong="H7725"\w*, That unto me every \w knee|strong="H1290"\w* shall \w bow|strong="H3766"\w*, every \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* shall \w swear|strong="H7650"\w*.

Surely, shall \add one\add* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, in the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* have I \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* and \w strength|strong="H5797"\w*: \add even\add* to him shall \add men\add* \w come|strong="H0935"\w*; and all that are \w incensed|strong="H2734"\w* against him shall be \w ashamed|strong="H0954"\w*.\f + \fr 45.24 \ft Surely…: or, Surely he shall say of me, In the \+nd LORD\+nd* is all righteousness and strength\f*\f + \fr 45.24 \ft righteousness: Heb. righteousnesses\f*
In the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall all the \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* be \w justified|strong="H6663"\w*, and shall \w glory|strong="H1984"\w*.
